scripts.deploy:remote-browser: gcloud builds submit . --project windose-cee16 --tag gcr.io/windose-cee16/windose-remote-browser --file Dockerfile.remote-browser && gcloud run deploy windose-remote-browser --region us-central1 --project windose-cee16 --allow-unauthenticated --port 8080 --image gcr.io/windose-cee16/windose-remote-browser
scripts.deploy:yt-audio-proxy: gcloud builds submit services/yt-audio-proxy --project windose-cee16 --tag gcr.io/windose-cee16/windose-yt-audio-proxy && gcloud run deploy windose-yt-audio-proxy --region us-central1 --project windose-cee16 --allow-unauthenticated --port 8080 --image gcr.io/windose-cee16/windose-yt-audio-proxy
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build && npx firebase-tools deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && npx firebase-tools hosting:channel:deploy preview
